content:
Congratulations on earning 500 points last Wednesday!

Regarding your question, I'd be happy to help. According to ShopRite's website and loyalty program terms, you can indeed earn points on online purchases made through their website or mobile app, as long as you're logged in to your loyalty account or enter your loyalty card number during checkout.

To ensure you earn points on your online purchase, make sure to:

1. Sign in to your ShopRite account on their website or mobile app before checking out.
2. Enter your loyalty card number or log in to your loyalty account during the checkout process.
3. Make sure your loyalty card is linked to your online account.

As long as you follow these steps, you should earn points on your online purchase, just like you would in-store.

Keep in mind that points may not be awarded immediately and may take some time to appear in your account. If you have any issues or concerns, you can always contact ShopRite's customer service for assistance.

Happy shopping, and I hope you continue to rack up those points!
